skins.shipDescription: Second ship of the Shoukaku-class aircraft carriers, Zuikaku.
skins.selfIntroduction: I’m Zuikaku from the Fifth Carrier Divison, though I was assigned to the First Carrier Division at one point. Together with my sister Shoukaku, we became the last two elite carriers of the Sakura Empire. We triumphed in bitter battles against Lexington, Hornet, and even Enterprise. That’s right, I was even able to severely damage the Grey Ghost herself, although she proved to be luckier than me. My service came to an end when Lexington, risen from the dead, sunk me. In the end, I still completed my final mission and sank with no regrets.
skins.acquisition: I am Zuikaku, the last elite of the Sakura Empire’s Carrier Divisions. I can only be at my best when I am with my sister Shoukaku.
skins.login: Where are we going today? Pearl Harbor? Or perhaps the Coral Sea?
skins.details: That Grey Ghost... I’d like to duel her just once.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Shoukaku is so cute when she’s embarrassed!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Keep fighting until the last arrow is broken! That is what it means to be an elite!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Wait, Grey Ghost, don’t run away just because you won! Let’s have a rematch!
skins.secretaryTouch: My least favorite food? Turkey, of course.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, Shoukaku’s are larger and softer...

skins.shipDescription: New Elite 1st CarDiv, Zuikaku, reporting for duty! Ahh, I've always wanted to give such a cool introduction! Shoukaku would definitely make fun of me if she heard it, but I wanted to try it while everyone is in a festive mood... Commander, what'd you think?
skins.acquisition: New Elite 1st CarDiv, Zuikaku, reporting for duty! Ahh, I've always wanted to give such a cool introduction! Shoukaku would definitely make fun of me if she heard it, but I wanted to try it while everyone is in a festive mood... Commander, what'd you think?
skins.login: Commander, how should we begin our work today? Allow me to aid you!
skins.details: I'm giving off a different vibe from usual? Hehe, I'll take that as a compliment! As a matter of fact, I do like trying on different outfits from time to time for a change of pace.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Akagi isn't exactly a fan of these large gatherings... Wait, could she be antisocial?! Err, that doesn't seem right...
skins.secretaryIdle2: T-Taihou?! You can't do that kind of stuff in public! Commander too, you should keep your distance! Stay hidden until I say otherwise!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, would you like something to eat? Can't grow big and strong without good food, you know~ Hahaha, just kidding!
skins.secretaryTouch: Huh? What's the matter, Commander? Is there some place you'd like to check out?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Uhh... So you wanted to compare mine to Shoukaku's after all?

skins.shipDescription: Commander, I volunteered to take this job in order to help you out, but this outfit... did it always require such a high degree of exposure...?
skins.acquisition: Commander, I volunteered to take this job in order to help you out, but this outfit... did it always require such a high degree of exposure...?
skins.login: Commander, it's fine! You don't need to worry about me! I can totally handle something like this!
skins.details: Oh, Shoukaku was also doing this job, right? Even though she's also wearing the same outfit, she gives off completely different vibes than me...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Hmm... I just can't pull the look off as well as Shoukaku... Is this the difference in our "girlish appeal?"
skins.secretaryIdle2: Is this job just to sit here for the photo ops...? I thought I'd get to drive...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Phew...! Keep it together, Zuikaku... You've gotta look your best in front of the camera!
skins.secretaryTouch: Hold this position a bit longer...? Mm, can't I ask for a slightly cooler pose...?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, you're not doing this kind of stuff to the other girls, are you...?
